prayer: Dear Lord it is beyond my understanding that You loved us so much that You were willing to allow your own Son to be sacrifice for our sins that we might have eternal life. Help me to always accept this gift by faith. . . Amen.

subject: Devo. for Nov. 14

prayer: I thank you Lord for the many blessings that are ours though our faith in Your Son Jesus Christ. . . Amen.

prayer: Dear Heavenly Father, I thank You for Your love and mercy gifting us the free gift of eternal life though faith in Your Son our Lord Jesus Christ. . . Amen.

subject: Devo. for Nov. 27

reflection: The phrase, "YOU WERE DEAD" paints a clear picture of what man really is. Lost and spiritually dead not merely weakened, incapacitated, disabled or sick. What Paul is describing is a person who was waking the wrong path conforming to this world.
prayer: Dear heavenly Father, I thank You for Your Word, which is a lamp onto my feet and a light onto my path, which shows me that I am a sinner in need of Your saving grace. . . Amen.

prayer: O Lord, I thank You for Your love and mercy not dealing out to me what I deserve but loving me in spite of my sinful nature. . . Amen

verse: "God raised us up with Him, and seated us with Him in heavenly places in Christ Jesus. " (Eph. 2:6)
reflection: Notice if you would, this text is written in the past tense. Christ WAS raised in a physical resurrection and we in a past spiritual resurrection. God has dealt with us in Christ and sees us in Christ.
prayer: I thank You Lord for Your loving kindness in what You have done for us though the sacrifice of Your own Son our Lord Jesus Christ. I thank You for His willingness to go the way of the cross for my sins. . . Amen.
original_content:
VERSE FOR TODAY:

_"God raised us up with Him, and seated us with Him_

_in heavenly places in Christ Jesus." _(Eph. 2:6)

THOUGHT FOR TODAY:

Notice if you would, this text is written in the past tense.

Christ WAS raised in a physical resurrection and we in a

past spiritual resurrection. God has dealt with us in Christ

and sees us in Christ.

PRAYER FOR TODAY:

I thank You Lord for Your loving kindness in what You

have done for us though the sacrifice of Your own Son

our Lord Jesus Christ. I thank You for His willingness

to go the way of the cross for my sins. . . Amen.

subject: Devo. for Nov. 30
verse: (a continuation to previous verses) "So tat in ages to come He might show the surpassing riches of His grace in kindness toward us in Christ Jesus. . . (Eph. 2:7)
reflection: God delights in showing great grace to great sinners. What I see by the words (The ages to come) is that God will show the trophies of His great grace throughout the endless ages of eternity (the great trophies) being all who have accepted Christ as their Lord and Savior.
prayer: I thank You Lord for Your grace, mercy and Your love for a sinner like me, making it possible that I may have a place in Your trophy case for all eternity. . . Amen.

subject: Devo. fr Nov. 31
verse: "By grace you have been saved through faith; and that not of yourselves, it is a gift from God. " (Eph. 1:8)
reflection: Grace is what God does for man, not what man does for God or himself. Salvation is God's greatest gift for man's greatest need. Grace is God's provision, faith is man's appropriation. Grace comes through God's love - - Faith comes through the hearing God's Word.
prayer: I thank You Lord for Your gift of grace which we receive because of Your love. I thank You too for the gift of faith which I received through the hearing of Your Word. . . Amen.
